thread.title: English FA suspends support for Platini's FIFA candidacy - World - Sports
thread.title_full: English FA suspends support for Platini's FIFA candidacy - World - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: English FA suspends support for Platini's FIFA candidacy - World - Sports
text:
Related UEFA 'fully supports' Michel Platini: Austrian FA head UEFA crisis talks on Platini begin in Switzerland FIFA ethics committee says Platini complaints "not valid" The English Football Association has suspended support for Michel Platini's bid to become FIFA president, after learning "more information relating to the issues at the centre of this case from Mr Platini's lawyers".
In a statement issued on its website (www.theFA.com), the FA said that "as a result of learning this information, the FA board has on Friday morning concluded that it must suspend its support for Mr Platini's candidature for the FIFA Presidency until the legal process has been concluded and the position is clear."
Platini, president of European soccer's governing body UEFA, denies any wrongdoing.
(For more sports news and updates, follow Ahram Online Sports on Twitter at @AO_Sports and on Facebook at AhramOnlineSports .)
